name: cobol
description: IntelliSense, highlighting, snippets and more for COBOL, JCL, PL/I & DIR and HLASM

coboleditor.copybookdirs.description: COBOL CopyBook directories to search into

coboleditor.ignorecolumn_b_onwards.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.ignorecolumn_b_onwards.title: include column 72 onwards in parsing

coboleditor.copybooks_nested.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.copybooks_nested.markdownDescription: nest copybooks in outline view (restart required)
coboleditor.copybooks_nested.title: nest copybooks in outline view (restart require)

coboleditor.fuzzy_variable_search.title: fuzzy variable search
coboleditor.fuzzy_variable_search.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases

coboleditor.cache_metadata.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.cache_metadata.title: Cache directory location

coboleditor.cache_metadata_user_director.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.cache_metadata_user_director.markdownDescription: User specific directory for the workspace metadata cache (directory has to exist)
coboleditor.cache_metadata_user_director.title: User specific directory for the workspace metadata cache (directory has to exist)

coboleditor.cache_metadata_time_limit.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.cache_metadata_time_limit.markdownDescription: Limited the time to process the cache (on startup) in ms
coboleditor.cache_metadata_time_limit.title: Limited the time to process the cache (on startup)

coboleditor.cache_metadata_max_directory.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.cache_metadata_max_directory.markdownDescription: Limited the depth of the metadata cache directory scan
coboleditor.cache_metadata_max_directory.title: Limited the depth of the metadata cache directory scan

coboleditor.cache_metadata_show_progress.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.cache_metadata_show_progress.markdownDescription: Show log message during meta data processing

coboleditor.margin.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases
coboleditor.margin.title: apply margin shading

coboleditor.fileformat_strategy.title: always_fixed or normal
enumDescriptions: Assume source code if fixed format
Determine source code format or configure it

items.title: List of properties to match file format

enumDescriptions: source code format fixed (classic COBOL margins)
source code format variable (no right margin)

coboleditor.fileformat.description: An array of filenames/patterns and its associated source format

coboleditor.outline.markdownDescription: Configure or disable outline view for COBOL
coboleditor.outline.description: on=everything, partial=no paragraphs, skeleton=basic structure and off
enumDescriptions: Scans everything in the source (can be costly)
Scans very little but might be enough for basic navigation

coboleditor.pre_parse_line_limit.title: Set pre-parse line limit
coboleditor.pre_parse_line_limit.description: Set pre-parse line limit, used to determine if source is COBOL or a CopyBook.

coboleditor.linter.title: Enable basic linting
coboleditor.linter.description: Enable basic linting (limited to sections/paragraph use)

coboleditor.linter_mark_as_information.title: Mark all linter problems as information
coboleditor.linter_mark_as_information.description: Mark all linter problems as information (false is hint)

coboleditor.linter_unused_paragraphs_or_.title: Enable basic linting
coboleditor.linter_unused_paragraphs_or_.description: Enable basic linting (limited to sections/paragraph use)

coboleditor.sourceview_include_jcl_files.title: Include JCL Files in source view
coboleditor.sourceview_include_jcl_files.description: Include JCL Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_hlasm_fil.title: Include HLASM Files in source view
coboleditor.sourceview_include_hlasm_fil.description: Include HLASM Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_pli_files.title: Include PL/I Files in source view
coboleditor.sourceview_include_pli_files.description: Include PL/I Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_doc_files.title: Include Documentation Files in source view
coboleditor.sourceview_include_doc_files.description: Include Documentation Files in source view

coboleditor.sourceview_include_script_fi.title: Include Script Files in source view
coboleditor.sourceview_include_script_fi.description: Include Script Files in source view

coboleditor.line_comment.title: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL specific
coboleditor.line_comment.description: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL specific

coboleditor.mfunit.diagnostic.color.title: Enable ANSI color
coboleditor.mfunit.diagnostic.color.description: Enable ANSI color when using the Micro Focus Unit Testing Framework (mfunit) in terminal

coboleditor.intellisense_include_unchang.title: Include result unchanged in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_unchang.description: Include result unchanged in intellisense results (default true)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_camelca.title: Include camelcase in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_camelca.description: Include camelcase in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_upperca.title: Include uppercase results in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_upperca.description: Include uppercase results in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_lowerca.title: Include lowercase results in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_lowerca.description: Include lowercase results in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.title: Max number of items to return
coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.description: Max number of items to return (default 120)

coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.title: Process metadata cache on startup
coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.description: Process metadata cache on extension load (default false)
coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and be removed in future releases

coboleditor.linter_ignore_section_before.title: Do not warn on unused section before entry-point
coboleditor.linter_ignore_section_before.description: Do not issue a warning if a unused section occurs before a entry-point, as this is often used to stop code trickling through to the next statements.

coboleditor.scan_comments_for_hints.description: Process scanner hints embedded in comments

coboleditor.scan_comment_copybook_token.description: Comment token used for processing source code dependencies, for example extra copybooks

coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_fi.title: Process metadata on file save
coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_fi.deprecationMessage: This setting is depreciated and may be removed in future releases

coboleditor.format_on_return.markdownDescription: Format line on return key (camelcase or uppercase)
coboleditor.format_on_return.title: Format line on return key (camelcase or uppercase)

commands.title: Check workspace folders recursively for potential copybook directories
Process files in workspace for metadata
Migrate copybook settings to workspace (for performance)
